title: Hero MotoCorp launches Passion Xtec motorcycle; price starts at Rs 74,590
description: Hero MotoCorp Head of Strategy and Global Product Planning Malo Le Masson said the company's range of 'XTec' products, such as the Splendor+ XTec, Glamour 125 XTec, Pleasure+ 110 XTec and Destini 125 XTec have "received an overwhelming response from customers and we expect the Passion XTec to continue this trend".
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
